1. Go to [quartopub.com](https://quartopub.com/) and create a free account. Make sure you're logged in.

2. In the terminal, run this:

   ```{.bash filename="Terminal" code-line-numbers="false"}
   quarto publish
   ```

3. Select `Quarto Pub` and press enter. Answer all the other questions.

4. Wait for the site to render and upload.
